title: Can We Do This?
description: The United States launches an aggressive plan to beat the Soviets to the moon.

title: Apollo One
description: NASA prepares for the Apollo 1 mission, then investigates the cause of the mission's tragic cabin fire.

title: We Have Cleared the Tower
description: With a documentary film crew watching their every step NASA prepares for the Apollo 7 mission.
During the turbulent year of 1968 Susan Borman looks with dread on her husband's impending mission to orbit the moon.

title: Spider
description: The evolution of the lunar module at Grumman Aircraft Engineering.

title: Mare Tranquilitatis
description: Buzz Aldrin, Neil Armstrong, and Michael Collins prepare for the Apollo 11 mission to the moon.

title: That's All There Is
description: On the Apollo 12 mission rookie astronaut Alan Bean becomes the fourth person to walk on the moon.

title: We Interrupt This Program
description: The Apollo 13 mission as seen through the reporting of two newscasters, highlighting the changing character of news coverage.

title: For Miles and Miles
description: Ten years after becoming the first American in space Alan Shepard battles back from health problems to command the Apollo 14 mission.

title: Galileo Was Right
description: The Apollo 15 astronauts and backup crew go through extensive geology training in preparation for their mission.

title: The Original Wives Club
description: The lives of the astronaut wives during their NASA years and beyond - through speaking engagements and fashion shows, alcoholism and divorce.

title: Le voyage dans la lune
description: The last manned Apollo mission to the moon is juxtaposed with
